member.name: T:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService
member.summary: Provides access to a simulated differential drive service.\n(Uses the Generic Differential Drive contract.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.#ctor(Microsoft.Dss.ServiceModel.Dssp.DsspServiceCreationPort)
member.summary: SimulatedDifferentialDriveService constructor that takes a PortSet to notify when the service is created

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.Start
member.summary: Start initializes service state and listens for drop messages

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.SetPowerHandler(Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Drive.Proxy.SetDrivePower)
member.summary: Handler for setting the drive power

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.SetSpeedHandler(Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Drive.Proxy.SetDriveSpeed)
member.summary: Handler for setting the drive speed

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.EnableHandler(Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Drive.Proxy.EnableDrive)
member.summary: Handler for enabling or disabling the drive

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.AllStopHandler(Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Drive.Proxy.AllStop)
member.summary: Handler when the drive receives an all stop message

member.name: M:Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Simulation.Drive.SimulatedDifferentialDriveService.EncoderResetHandler(Microsoft.Robotics.Services.Drive.Proxy.ResetEncoders)
member.summary: Resets the encoder tick count to zero on both wheels Not implemented in this service.
